text: Marc Singer (born January 29, 1948) is a Canadian-born American actor. Singer is perhaps best known for his roles in the Beastmaster movie series, as Mike Donovan in the original 1980s TV series V, as Dr. Kirk Langstrom / Man-Bat in Batman: The Animated Series (1992) and his role in Dallas (1978) as Matt Cantrell.
